questions.q: What is ActivityWiz?
questions.a: ActivityWiz is a smart platform for creating personalized activities for instructors and educators. You can use it to access ready-made activities or generate new ones automatically using artificial intelligence.

questions.q: Do I need to register to use the site?
questions.a: No. You can browse and use the site without registration, but signing up unlocks extra features like saving and editing your activities.

questions.q: Is the site free to use?
questions.a: Yes.

questions.q: Who is the site for?
questions.a: Anyone who leads groups: youth movement leaders, teachers, educators, parents, teen counselors, army commanders, and more.

questions.q: How do I create a personalized activity?
questions.a: Select the 'Create Activity' option and fill out a few simple details. The system will generate a ready-to-use activity tailored to your needs.

questions.q: Can I share activities with others?
questions.a: Yes! Every activity can be shared via a link or by copying the content to your clipboard.

questions.q: Can I edit an automatically generated activity?
questions.a: Yes. You can manually edit any activity to match your exact style and group needs.

questions.q: Can I save the activities I created for later use?
questions.a: Yes. Once you sign up, you can save any activity you've created and access or update it anytime.

questions.q: Will the site be available in languages other than English?
questions.a: We are currently working on adding support for more languages in the near future.

questions.q: How can I contact the ActivityWiz team?
questions.a: You can reach us through the contact form on the site or by email at support@activitywiz.com.
